0.content: [ Ascians: a mysterious cult, taught beast tribes how to summon(Primals), have a hidden agenda, deity(Zodiark), appear wearing(masks,black robes), can possess people, consists of(The Unsundered,Ascian Overlords,Minor Ascians,Telophoroi); ]

1.content: [ The Unsundered: referred to as(Paragons of the Source), originally members of(The Convocation of Fourteen), most powerful Ascians, members(Lahabrea,Elidibus,Emet-Selch), all members deceased; ]

2.content: [ Ascian Overlords: ranked below(The Unsundered), ranked above(Minor Ascians), reincarnated members of(The Convocation of Fourteen), members(Pashtarot,Altima,Emmerololth,Baldesion,Nabriales,Igeyorhm,Loghrif,Mitron,Fanadaniel,Halmarut,Deudalphon); ]

3.content: [ Minor Ascians: subordinates of(The Unsundered,Ascian Overlords), cannot possess bodies, referred to as generic names, generic names(Travanchet,Masked Mage,Ascian of the Twelfth); ]

4.content: [ Telophoroi: a faction in the(Garlean Empire), led by(Zenos yae Galvus,Fanadaniel), goal(reenact the Final Days); ]

5.content: [ The Final Days: a phenomenon, believed to bring the end of the world, occurred in(Etheirys), chance to reoccur in(The Source), caused by(Meteia to end humanity's suffering of death and despair), can transform people into(beasts of the Final Days), suppressed by(The Convocation of Fourteen by summoning the primal Zodiark); ]

6.content: [ Convocation of Fourteen: was the main governing body of(The World Unsundered), oversaw(policies,order) in creation, members(Loghrif,Mitron,Emet-Selch,Pashtarot,Fandaniel,Altima,Halmarut,Nabriales,Igeyorhm,Deudalaphon,Emmerololith,Lahabrea,Elidibus,Azem), was doomed by(Hermes), resided in(Etheirys), led to the creation of(Ascians); ]

7.content: [ Limsa Lominsa: a marine city-state, a island nation, loocated on the island of(Vylbrand), has a(bustling port), a pirate hideout, leader(Merlwyb Bloefhiswyn), part of the(Eorzean Alliance), Areas(The Upper Decks, The Lower Decks); ]

8.content: [ The Lower Decks: a area in(Limsa Lominsa), Subareas(Bulwark,The Octant,Hawker's Alley,Mealvaan's Gate,Fisherman's Bottom); ]

9.content: [ The Upper Decks: a area in(Limsa Lominsa), Subareas(The Drowning Wench,The Seventh Sage,The Bismarck,Coral Tower,The Aftcastle,The Hyaline,Maelstrom Command,Airship Landing); ]

10.content: [ La Noscea: a region in(Eorzea), part of(The Source), home to(Limsa Lominsa), a island, Areas(Lower La Noscea,Middle La Noscea,Western La Noscea,Eastern La Noscea,Upper La Noscea,Outer La Noscea); ]

11.content: [ Gridania: a city-state, located in the middle of(The Black Shroud), leader(Kan-E-Senna), part of the(Eorzean Alliance), Areas(New Gridania,Old Gridania); ]

12.content: [ Old Gridania: a area in(Gridania), Subareas(Shaded Bower,Wailing Barracks,Leatherworkers' Guild,Mih Khetto's Amphiteatre,Botanist' Guild,Nophica's Altar,Lotus Stand,Stillglade Fane,Westshore Pier,Yellow Serpent Gate); ]

13.content: [ The Black Shroud: a region in(Eorzea), part of(The Source), a forest, home to(Gridania), Areas(Central Shroud,North Shroud,East Shroud,West Shroud,South Shroud), located(North of Thanalan,Southeast of Coerthas,West of Gyr Abania); ]

14.content: [ Ul'dah: a city-state, located in(Thanalan), leader(Nanamo Ul Namo), the most wealthy city-state in Eorzea, Areas(The Steps of Nald,The Steps of Thal,Airship Landing); ]

15.content: [ New Gridania: a area in(Gridania), Subareas(Gridania Aetheryte Plaza,Carpenters' Guild,Quiver's Hold,Adders' Nest,Blue Badger Gate,White Wolf Gate,Airship Landing); ]

16.content: [ The Steps of Thal: a area in(Ul'dah), Subareas(Sapphire Avenue Exchange,Sunsilk Tapestries,Miners' Guild,Goldsmiths' Guild,The Coliseum,The Gold Court,Royal Promenade,Scholars' Walk,Gate of Thal); ]

17.content: [ The Steps of Nald: a area in(Ul'dah), Subareas(Arrzaneth Ossuary,Platnium Mirage,Hall of Flames,Ul'dah Aetheryte Plaza,Ruby Road Exchange,The Quicksand,Gate of the Sultana,Gate of Nald); ]

18.content: [ Thanalan: a region in(Eorzea), part of(The Source), home to(Ul'dah), a desert, Areas(Central Thanalan,Northern Thanalan,Eastern Thanalan,Western Thanalan,Southern Thanalan), located(West of The Black Shroud); ]

19.content: [ Ishgard: a city-state, located in(Coerthas), leader(Ser Aymeric), located within(Northern Aldenard), Areas(Foundation,The Pillars), part of the(Eorzean Alliance); ]

20.content: [ Foundation: a area in(Ishgard), the low-class section of Ishgard, Subareas(Saint Reinette Forum,Skysteel Manufactory,The Holy Stables,Saint Valeroyant Forum,The Forgotten Knight,Congregation of Our Knights Most Heavenly,The Lightfeather Proving Grounds,The Brume); ]

21.content: [ The Pillars: a area in(Ishgard), the high-class section of Ishgard, Subareas(Jeweled Crozier,Atheneum Arcaneum,The Final Vigil,Airship Landing,The Hoplon,Saint Reymanaud Cathedral,The Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine,The Vault); ]

22.content: [ The Northern Empty: a region in(Eorzea), part of(The Source), home to(Old Sharlayan), a island, Areas(Labyrinthos), located(South of Aldenard,east of Ilsabard); ]

23.content: [ Old Sharlayan: a city-state, located in(The Northern Empty), leader(The Forum), Areas(The Leveilleur Estate,The Scholar,Noumenon,The Studium,The Rostra,The Last Stand,The Baldesion Annex,The Dark Cells,Psysis Technon); ]

24.content: [ The Source: a planet, similar to(Earth), home to(Eorzea), continents(Aldenard,Ilsabard,Othard,Meracydia,Tural), islands(Vylbrand,Hingashi,Thavnair,Sharlayan,Aerslaent), ruling factions(Eorzean Alliance,Garlean Empire), major cities(Limsa Lominsa,Ul'dah,Gridania,Ishgard,Ala Mhigo,Garlemald,Radz-at-Han,Sharlayan,Doma,Kugane,Bukyo,Rabanastre), the original star of Hyadelyn's thirteen refections, past name(Etheirys); ]

25.content: [ The First: a reflection of(The Source), a reflection of a planet, continents(Norvrandt), major places(The Crystarium,Eulmore); ]

26.content: [ Coerthas: a region in(Eorzea), part of(The Source), home to(Ishgard), a mountanous area, a snowy area, Areas(Coerthas Central Highlands,Coerthas Western Highlands), located(Northwest of The Black Shroud); ]

27.content: [ Meteia: collective name for(Meteion and her Sisters), disappeared into the far edge of the universe, used despair to drive the Final Days; ]

28.content:
[ Meteion: race(Entelechy), created by(Hermes in Elpis), created using(Dynamis), has several identical sisters, possesses a shared consciousness with her sisters, purpose(to find the meaning of life), only found dead or dying worlds, concluded(that existence was suffering,to end all life in the universe as a mercy to suffering); ]
[ Entelechy: a bird-human race, features(wings as ears, clawed feet as legs); ]
